business_details.description: Internal facing business information for the account.

business_profile.description: Public facing business information for the account.

currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code representing the default currency for the account. This must be a currency that Versify supports in the account’s country.

email.description: The accounts email address. This is the default email to send invoices to.

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format.

settings.description: Options for customizing how the account functions within Versify.

tos_acceptance.description: Details on the account’s acceptance of the Versify Services Agreement.
